mapper.select: select id, pid, name, trashed,created_date as createdDate,comment from category
mapper.insert: insert into category ( id, pid, name, trashed,created_date,comment) values ( #{id}, #{pid}, #{name}, #{trashed}, now(),#{comment})
mapper.update: update category set pid=#{pid}, name=#{name}, trashed=#{trashed}, created_date=now(), comment=#{comment} where id=#{id}
mapper.select: select max(id) from category where pid=#{pid}
